thread.section_title: Superior Van and Mobility Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Superior Van and Mobility | www.superiorvan.com
thread.title: Carianne Meystrik
thread.title_full: Superior Van and Mobility reviewed by Carianne Meystrik

author: Carianne Meystrik
title: Carianne Meystrik
text: If you understand the necessity and importance of staying mobile when confined to a wheelchair, you will appreciate the efforts this company makes to get your problems fixed as soon as possible. They have worked on maintaining and fixing my van lift the last several years in a fast and fair way. I appreciate their service.
